meanings.definition: Very serious or gloomy in character or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The storm clouds looked grimmest as they covered the sky.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house had the grimmest atmosphere, sending shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent3: Despite its grimmest look, the old scarecrow made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: The grimmest shadows of the night seemed to whisper eerie secrets.
meanings.sent5: The grimmest expression on her face told me something was terribly wrong.

meanings.sent3: Even the grimmest movie made him smile with its over-the-top drama.
meanings.sent4: The grimmest memories haunted her dreams, leaving her restless at night.
meanings.sent5: The grimmest reality of the situation hit him like a ton of bricks.
